SEARCH.DESCRIPTION: Here we go with the icons related to {{term}}. All icons are created by the Icons8 designers, therefore they have the same style and quality. Each {{term}} icon is a flat icon. All of them are vector icons. They're available for a free download in PNG of up to 100x100 px. For vectors, such as SVG, EPS, or font, please buy the icons.

DESCRIPTION_PLATFORM.win10: This is the {{name}} icon for Windows 10. Here we go. Optimized for 32x32 px, these are the simplest icons in the line style. Downloadable formats are PNG and SVG, among others. Icons8 icon pack is unique in providing a huge number of icons designed by the same team of four designers who create the new icons every working day in the same style and with the same quality. Same cool as the Bat Face, huh.
DESCRIPTION_PLATFORM.ios7: This is a {{name}} icon. We've made it in iOS style, first introduced in iOS version 7 and supported in all later releases up until now (at least iOS 11). This style is based on thin two-pixel lines and is optimized for 50x50 px. Unlike other vector icon packs that have merely hundreds of icons, this icon pack contains {{iconsCountsIos7}} icons, all in the same style and quality.
DESCRIPTION_PLATFORM.androidL: This {{name}} icon is made in Material Design style developed by Google. This style is based on extremely simplified shapes, thin two-pixel lines, and is optimized for 24x24 px. Unlike other vector icon packs that have merely hundreds of icons, this icon pack contains {{iconsCountsAndroidL}} icons, all in the same style and quality.

VIEW_ICONS.RELATED_TEXT: Related icons are the icons with matching tags, as well as all {{categoryLowercase}} icons. All icons are in the same flat style. You can either download free PNG icons or buy SVG vectors

RANDOM_DESCRIPTION.0: This icon is a part of a collection of {{name}} flat icons produced by Icons8. Icons follow the guidelines of iOS, Windows, and Android and are designed by a single designer, guaranteeing the consistent quality.
RANDOM_DESCRIPTION.1: This page shows the different variations of the {{name}} from an Icons8 icon pack. Feel free to resize and recolor the icon, and then download the icon in PNG format for free.
RANDOM_DESCRIPTION.2: {{name}} and other {{iconsCount}} icons from Icons8 icon pack follow the visual guidelines of the operating systems: Windows, iOS, Android KitKat, and Material. PNG format is free up to 100x100 px.
RANDOM_DESCRIPTION.3: This page contains the {{icons}} vector icon, as well as variations of this icon in different visual styles, and related icons. All icons are in the flat vector style, however, differ by the line thickness, fill, and corner radius.
RANDOM_DESCRIPTION.4: This is a {{icons}} icon. It is available in PNG and vector. Downloading is free for PNGs up to 100x100px.
RANDOM_DESCRIPTION.default: This is a {{icons}} icon. It is a part of a collection of {{iconsCount}} flat icons produced by Icons8. Icons follow the guidelines of iOS, Windows, and Android and are designed by a single team of icon designers, guaranteeing the consistent quality. PNG and vector (SVG, EPS, and PDF).

ios7.TITLE: Free iOS Icons
ios7.DESCRIPTION:
Our iOS icon pack follows the guidelines from Apple. These icons are pixel-perfect at 50√ó50 pixels and the style is outline with the base stroke being 2px. All the icons have a filled version. This pack works for iOS applications with vertical lists like iOS Mail App.

This is by far our most popular icon pack. The Icons8 team created all the icons in-house, and our senior icon designer, Alex, started it immediately after the iOS 7 release and keeps drawing and supervising it to this day.

androidL.TITLE: Free Material Design Icons
androidL.DESCRIPTION:
This pack fits any Android app. These system icons symbolize common actions, files, devices, and directories.

Our Material Filled icon pack follows the material guidelines from Google, including the latest icon themes (filled, outlined, rounded, two-tone, and sharp versions for each icon). All themes are pixel-perfect at 24√ó24 pixels.

Material icon pack succeeds the previous icon pack for Android, Ice Cream.

The Icons8 team created all the icons in-house. Our senior icon designer, Alex, started it immediately after iOS 7 release and keeps drawing and supervising it to this day.
androidL.FEATURES:
For Android and Google Material

Pixel-perfect at 24√ó24px

5 themes: filled, outlined, rounded, two-tone, and sharp
androidL.NEW_ICONS: New Icons in Material Design Style

m_outlined.DESCRIPTION: These icons are pixel-perfect at 24√ó24 pixels and are available in PNG, SVG, and PDF. Unlike other websites, Icons8 creates most of these icons in-house, ensuring the stable quality.

ios11.TITLE: Free iOS Glyph Icons
ios11.DESCRIPTION: Our iOS Glyph icon pack follows the guidelines from Apple. iOS Glyph icons are created on a 30√ó30 px canvas with a consistent stroke width of 2 px. This pack fits iOS applications with tabs like Clock, Photos, or Health applications.

color.TITLE: Free Color Icons
color.DESCRIPTION: These icons are pixel-perfect at 48√ó48 pixels and are available in PNG, SVG, and PDF. Unlike other websites, Icons8 creates most of these icons in-house, ensuring the stable quality.

p1em.TITLE: Free Simple Small Icons
p1em.DESCRIPTION: This icon pack was created especially for using the icons as a font. All of the icons are aligned on a font baseline and so are the best choice to be used as a font (ex: on the button)
p1em.FEATURES:
Pixel-perfect at 16x16

Line width 1 px

Created to be used as a font

win10.TITLE: Free Windows 10 Icons
win10.DESCRIPTION: Our Windows 10 icon pack follows the guidelines from Microsoft. Windows 10 outline icons are created on a 32x32 px canvas with sharp corners and a consistent stroke width of 2 px. This pack works for any Windows 10 application.

android.TITLE: Free Android Ice Cream Icons
android.DESCRIPTION: These icons were created on a 24x24 px canvas with a consistent stroke width of 2 px. This pack works for any application for Android OS 4 and earlier.
android.FEATURES:
Pixel-perfect at 24x24

Line width 2 px

For Android OS 4 and earlier
android.NEW_ICONS: New Icons for Android Ice Cream

win8.TITLE: Free Windows Metro Icons
win8.DESCRIPTION: This is the first Microsoft monochrome icon pack for the Windows 8 era. It was huge step for the flat design and the first icon pack for Icons8. We will always love you, Metro.

office.TITLE: Free Icons for Microsoft Office
office.DESCRIPTION:
This is our first responsive icon pack. Each icon was created in four different sizes with different level of detail. First, each icon has a small and large version (just like on the Microsoft Office toolbar, Office ribbon): 16x16, 30x30px. Second, each icon has the low-res and HD version(40x40, 80x80). This results in four sizes, each of which is a separate drawing created manually.

This icon pack fits any application in Microsoft Office style.
office.NEW_ICONS: New Icons for Microsoft Office Toolbar

ultraviolet.TITLE: Free Blue UI Icons
ultraviolet.DESCRIPTION: Since the blue theme is very popular in UI, our designer, Margarita decided to create this pack for you üôÇ. This icon pack is a blue version of our office icon pack with rounded corners.

dusk.TITLE: Free Cute Color Icons
dusk.DESCRIPTION: Cute Color is a decorative cartoonish icon style. Each icon is decorated with short lines and has some shadows and highlights.Cute Color is a color version of the Cute Outline icon style and will fit any desktop, web application, or presentation.

Dusk_Wired.TITLE: Free Cute Outline Icons
Dusk_Wired.DESCRIPTION: Cute Outline is a decorative cartoonish icon style, decorated with short lines. This icon pack fits any desktop, web application, or presentation. Cute Outline is a outline version of Cute Color icon style.

nolan.TITLE: Free Gradient Line Icons
nolan.DESCRIPTION: In contrast to color icons, Gradient Line is the first icon pack with gradient fill. Most of the icon shapes in this pack are geometric and based on square and rectangular shapes.

dotty.TITLE: Free Dotted Icons
dotty.DESCRIPTION: Dotted icons are created on a 80x80 px canvas with a consistent stroke width of 2 px. Just like iOS icons, these are designed as outline. But these are decorated by 2 px dots. This icon pack works well for applications or websites with a light or clear design.

plasticine.TITLE: Free Color Hand Drawn Icons
plasticine.DESCRIPTION: Color Hand Drawn is a decorative cartoonish icon style. The inner decorative border is dashed by irregular spaces and works fine for any desktop, web application, or any presentation. Color Hand Drawn is a color version of Hand Drawn icon style.
plasticine.FEATURES:
Based on a 100x100 px canvas

Border width 2px

Decorative inner border 1 px

carbon_copy.TITLE: Free Hand Drawn Icons
carbon_copy.DESCRIPTION: Hand Drawn is a decorative cartoonish icon style. The inner decorative border is dashed by irregular spaces. This icon pack works fine for any desktop, web application, or any presentation and is a version of Color Hand Drawn icon style.
carbon_copy.FEATURES:
Based on a 100x100 px canvasv

Border width 2px

Decorative inner border 1 px

clouds.TITLE: Free Cloud Icons
clouds.DESCRIPTION: Cloud is a decorative cartoonish icon style. Just like Color Hand Drawn and Hand Drawn, these icons are based on a 100x100 px canvas and work great fro any desktop, web application, or presentation.
clouds.FEATURES:
Based on a 100x100 px canvas

Decorative background

Decorated by clouds

bubbles.TITLE: Free Circle Bubbles Icons
bubbles.DESCRIPTION: Circile Bubbles is a decorative cartoonish icon style. Just like Color Hand Drawn and Hand Drawn, these icons are based on a 100x100 px canvas and fit any desktop, web application, or presentation.
bubbles.FEATURES:
Based on a 100x100 px canvas

Round background

Decorated by circles

cotton.TITLE: Free Pastel Icons
cotton.DESCRIPTION: Pastel is a cartoonish color icon pack based on a 128x128 px canvas. All the icons have a bold border. Just like Cute Color or Color Hand Drawn this icon pack is a good choice for any desktop, web application or any presentation.
cotton.FEATURES:
Based on a 128x128px canvas

Border width 6px

Color icons with bold border

flat_round.TITLE: Free Round Infographic Icons
flat_round.DESCRIPTION: Round Infographic icons based on a 512x512 px canvas with the main object placed inside the colored circle. These icons work well with complicated backgrounds, photos, etc.
flat_round.FEATURES:
Based on a 512x512 px canvas

Round icons

Color icons

doodle.TITLE: Free Doodle Icons
doodle.DESCRIPTION: Doodle is a decorative cartoonish icon style and, like Color Hand Drawn and Hand Drawn, these icons are based on a 100x100 px canvas. This icon pack fits any desktop, web application, or any presentation
doodle.FEATURES:
Based on a 512x512 px canvas

Hand-drawn icons

Color icons
